org.kj.pxe.server

Interface SocketFactory


  • public interface SocketFactory
    Provides sockets for DHCP offers and DHCP acks.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.net.DatagramSocket getDhcpAckSocket(java.net.InetAddress address)
      Should be used to create a socket used to either send or receive an ack.
      java.net.DatagramSocket getDhcpOfferSocket()
      Should be used to create a socket used to either send or receive an offer.

    • Method Detail

      • getDhcpOfferSocket

        java.net.DatagramSocket getDhcpOfferSocket()
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Should be used to create a socket used to either send or receive an offer.
        Returns:
        the socket
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there was an error creating the socket

      • getDhcpAckSocket

        java.net.DatagramSocket getDhcpAckSocket(java.net.InetAddress address)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Should be used to create a socket used to either send or receive an ack.
        Parameters:
        address - the address to connect the socket to
        Returns:
        the socket
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there was an error creating the socket
